quote: Private-sector preparedness is not a luxury; it is a cost of doing business in the post-9/11 world. It is ignored at a tremendous potential cost in lives, money and national security.
quote_letters: PRIVATE-SECTOR PREPAREDNESS IS NOT A LUXURY IT IS A COST OF DOING BUSINESS IN THE POST-'9''1''1' WORLD IT IS IGNORED AT A TREMENDOUS POTENTIAL COST IN LIVES MONEY AND NATIONAL SECURITY
